snippet: Starting Oct. 1, millions of Americans will be able to buy health plans available through online state marketplaces for coverage that begins in 2014.
abstract: Millions of Americans will soon be able to buy health plans available through online state and federal marketplaces for coverage that begins in 2014; analysts say pre-65 retirees, those not yet eligible for Medicare, are the 'big winners,' since marketplaces could allow them to buy policies for much less than they would pay today in some states, particularly those with expensive medical conditions.
lead_paragraph: Starting Oct. 1, millions of Americans will be able to buy health plans available through online state marketplaces for coverage that begins in 2014.

headline.main: In New Health Law, a Bridge to Medicare
headline.print_headline: In New Health Law, a Bridge to Medicare

keywords.value: Patient Protection and Affordable Care Act (2010)
keywords.name: subject
